column1: The '''''Reckoning of Years''''' was a book written by [[Meriadoc Brandybuck
column2: Merry Brandybuck]] sometime after the [[War of the Ring]].  In this work Merry discussed the relation of the calendars of [[Shire Calendar
column4: Bree]] to those of [[Reckoning of Rivendell
column6: Gondor]], and [[Rohan]].  This book was one of the important tomes kept in the library of [[Bucklebury]].<ref>{{FR
column7: Records}}</ref>  Some of the information contained in this work was probably translated and used by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] when he wrote "[[Appendix D]]" of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
